job.title: Junior Software Engineer
job.description: Who We Are<br><br>Enhance IT is an ITManagement firm that specializes in training, placement and IT consultation. We are an industry leader in providing top-level skilled and experienced consultants in a variety of technologies to meet our client s needs in today s fast paced environment.<br><br>What you will be doing<br><br>You will be joining our cutting-edge development team as it grows. We want individuals who are comfortable asking why? The ideal candidate for this role is motivated, energized and has a creative thought process. They are a team player possessing strong analytical as well as technical skills and are able to communicate the logic behind technical decisions to non-tech stakeholders. They must be comfortable working in an agile environment and have the ability to take the wheel when necessary.<br><br>What you need for this position<br><br>An object-oriented programming language such as Java, C or Kotlin or C++ or objective C or Python.<br><br>Sound understanding of the entire Software Development Lifecycle.<br><br>Strong knowledge of Software Design Patterns, data structures and best practices.<br><br>Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, Information Systems or related field.<br><br>Strong written and verbal communication skills.<br><br>Availability to travel and live in the U.S.<br><br>Bonus points<br><br>Hands on experience...<br><br>developing software with Agile Scrum or Kanban methodologies.<br><br>interacting with REST Web APIs (XML or Json).<br><br>using a VCS like Git or SVN.<br><br>working with third party libraries for Java using Maven or Gradle.<br><br><strong><u>Additional Criteria Skills<br><br></u></strong>Hands on experience with<br><br>Software Testing using tools like JUnit and Mockito.<br><br>Software Integration tools like JIRA, Jenkins.
